location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘MAP TO SHOW THE LIMITS OF KOWEIT AND ADJACENT COUNTRY’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:385 x 324 mm, on sheet 467 x 360 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Harrison & Sons Lith. St. Martins Lane, W.C.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Limits indicated by red, green and black lines and explained in ‘F.O. Memorandum of Feb. 28, 1913’.Bottom right below neat line: '(200. 2/13. 2479) F.O. 1370'.Other copies of this map hold at folio 125 and folio 294.

name.namePart: Harrison and Sons Ltd, printers, London
